name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - The Legend of Dead Kel
name_original: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - The Legend of Dead Kel
description:
Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - The Legend of Dead Kel is a RPG game developed by Big Huge Games and 38 Studios. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - The Legend of Dead Kel is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
